name: Plain
description: A flat plain provides easy travel and excellent visibility, but the lack of natural barriers offers no protection from enemies or weather. The fertile soil supports agriculture and large populations, while the open space is ideal for military formations and trade routes. Additionally, vast open grasslands provide excellent visibility and easy travel, but offer little natural cover from weather or enemies. the fertile soil supports agriculture and grazing, while the flat terrain makes it ideal for military formations and trade routes.
atmosphere: Vast flat expanse stretching to the horizon with open space and easy travel. Fresh air scented of grass and earth. Excellent visibility but vulnerability from lack of barriers. Fertile soil creates abundance.
